description:
This little app will bring you the Declaration of Independence on your webOS device! 

Thanks for your good ratings. An upgrade to the full version will bring you the U.S. Constitution as well as some specials (search engine, new layout...).

Note: If you have download problems, please contact HP/Palm. Well, If you have problems with our app, contact us via Email to fix your issue fast. 

Download now, this version is freeware...
copyright: Copyright of this App by Simon Pfundstein, 2011.
